entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using SSR (Angular) in .NET 6 #63317
  • [API Proposal]: Add architecture ARMv6 to Architecture enum #63310
  • Native frames missing crashreport.json #63309
    6.0.x
  • Convert remaining SAL v1 annotations to SAL v2 annotations #63307
  • Calling IHostApplicationLifetime.StopApplication() does not stop a service when configured using IHostBuilder.UseWindowsService() #63303
  • Add regex source generator tests that compare against known output #63300
    7.0.0
  • TypeLoadException from dynamically-generated assembly; does not occur from the same assembly loaded from disc #63294
  • Potential infinite loop on MacOS on connected sockets #63291
  • .NET 6 TrimMode CopyUsed isn't working like .NET 5? #63290
  • DirectoryInfo.MoveTo mistakenly prevents renaming directories to case variations of themselves on Windows, macOS #63287
  • RyuJIT: Recognize BLSR in "x & (x-1)" #63286
    Future
  • When hosting as Windows Service, Singletons are disposed AFTER the Service has reported to be stopped #63284
  • JIT cannot devirtualize interface call in trivial cases #63283
  • Can I combine DirSync Cookie with paging? Or some save-point functionality? #63273

Closed

  • How to change the ComHost Server registry name? #62529
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify rejects classes which inherit default interface method implementations #46236
    Future
  • Validate that ilasm/ildasm round-tripping does not lose alignment of FieldRVA data #62315
    7.0.0
  • Problem with Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration and Configuration.GetSection #63091
  • Parallel.For with long running tasks blocks background Timers on NET 6.0 #61804
    6.0.x
  • System.Drawing.EnableUnixSupport runtime switch has no effect #63027
  • Unexpected behavior of TimeSpan.FromSeconds #61909
  • Add back implicit anchoring optimization in Regex #42447
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Fix inconsistencies with numeric/math related operations in `System` namespace #63279
  • createdump fails on macOS 12 Monterey: Can not find the _dyld_all_image_infos symbol #62181
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: remove dependency on System.Drawing.Common from System.Windows.Extensions #62649
  • System.Threading.Timer.Timer max timeout mismatch #63258
  • Dotnet 6.0 Websocket Deflate Segfault On Ubuntu #62422
    6.0.x
  • SendPacketsElement_FileZeroCount_Success failed on Windows 11 x64 #63270
  • False positive trim analysis warning despite [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] when using iterator method #63264
  • Difference in symmetric encryption/decryption between .Net Core 5 and .Net Core 6 #63274
  • [API Proposal]: string.Join with two separators to create string like "1, 2, 3 and 4" #63250
  • `FileStream` Write has no effect when the file is deleted #63208

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder case where the compact encoding for a IP can't be found for a syscall wrapper #63319
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update COM host to match RegAsm registration behavior #63318
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [DllImportGenerator] Update buffer size field for custom marshalling #63316
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix build with Clang 13 #63314
    Servicing-consider, area-Meta, 6.0.x
  • Delete ILCompiler.TypeSystem.ReadyToRun project #63313
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][Perf][Mono] Enable llvm for arm perf runs #63311
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • clean up header collection property implementations #63308
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix GetSpanDataFrom #63306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add alignment to mapped field stream #63305
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [metadata] Borrow bits from MonoClassField:parent for flags #63302
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #63301
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] bump sourcebuild leg timeout #63298
  • [release/6.0-maui] transform sgen_get_descriptor to parallel safe version in job_major_mod_union_preclean #63296
    area-GC-mono
  • Improved HTTP/1 header parser #63295
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Revert SafeBuffer change around pointer initialization #63289
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • A few minor tweaks to Regex source generator rendering #63276
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Extend case optimization in MatchCharacterClass to all chars that differ by one bit #63275
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance

Merged

  • Update COM host to match RegAsm registration behavior #63292
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Fixed ILVerify incorrectly flagging valid default interface implementations #61185
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • transform sgen_get_descriptor to parallel safe version in job_major_mod_union_preclean #63293
    area-GC-mono, mono-mirror, community-contribution
  • Do not create non-null assertions from location nodes #62743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SAL2 _In_, _Out_ to prevent conflicts. #63261
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify threading between crossgen2 and ilc #63282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move things from ILCompiler.TypeSystem to ILCompiler.Compiler #63280
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Last ILCompiler.TypeSystem <-> ILCompiler.TypeSystem.ReadyToRun diff #63281
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix user => use typo in comments #63288
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Use pattern matching in RegexNode to reduce some "when" duplication #63278
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Don't access MonoClassField:parent directly #63081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add missing PTEST docs #62122
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Mark Regex source generator Go override as SkipLocalsInit if possible #63277
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Bump sourcebuild leg timeout #63297
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0-vs4mac] Set stabilize package version to false #62941
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix nullability annotations on ProcessModule.FileName/ModuleName #63272
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues in PAL #62625
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • Use interpolated strings in place of `StringBuilder.AppendFormat` where possible. #62160
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][release/6.0] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62705
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • Implement DiagnosticName in NativeAOT code #63271
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix strings typo #63269
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/6.0] Do not promote struct locals with holes #62738
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 18.04 and dotnet-buildtools-prereq docker images for enterprise linux pipeline #63014
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x

Updated

  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • HostBuilder.Build doc: mention lifetime #63123
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1533701 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62973
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Introduce `BasicBlock::KindIs()` for checking bbJumpKind #63203
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add some diagnostics for EFS tests #63243
    area-System.IO
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Robustify a name resolution test #63259
    area-System.Net
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.IO.Stream: Decorate validation helpers with [NotNull] to fix CA1062 false positives #62494
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-System.Net
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • add capture group name in comment #63255
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Divide properties into: public, private, protected. #62627
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix translation of Ping error codes #63237
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] Increase timeout for debugger tests on CI #63173
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Preserve `OBJ`/`BLK` on the RHS of `ASG` #63268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Compress operand kinds array and optimize `OperIsLocal` #63253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Don't merge CI test only] #61970
    * NO MERGE *
  • Use "pipeline-caching" for coreclr and libraries builds #62464
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62350
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Question: is it possible to disable reflection and keep reflection for assemblies in rd.xml file ? #1798

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bring back `dotnet migrate` to supported dotnet SDK versions #23230
  • .NET Framework 4.8 build with SGen.exe fails when referencing a .NET Standard 2.0 project #23225

Closed

  • error with dotnet run #22582

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23232
    Area-Infrastructure
  • I noticed that another test handled this better so cleaning up the test code. #23231
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1517744 #23098
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport changes from main #23229
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #23022
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: `NotNullWhenMember` attribute #5600

PullRequests

Created

  • Low level struct updates #5602

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidOperationException while inline renaming #58578
  • Member access inside object creation inserts unwanted parentheses #58574
  • (Edit and Continue) ENCXXXX warnings still appear even when EnC is disabled #58573
  • Add null check quick action adds one-liner #58571
  • Compiler crash when array access with from-end expression used in deconstruction assignment lowers to use a ref local and the right-hand side contains an await expression #58569
    17.1
  • IDE0059 Incorrectly reported for out arguments #58564
  • Duplicate syntax node callbacks for top-level statements #58561
    17.1
  • MoveToNamespace refactoring NRE #58560
  • Use interpolated strings instead of String.Concat or String.Join #58557
    Backlog

Closed

  • Annotate `SyntaxNode.CopyAnnotationsTo()` with `NotNullIfNotNull`? #56949
    Backlog
  • Compile-time and runtime conversion from double -> int producing different values #58498
  • Generate a desktop application at runtime (codegeneration) fails in NET 6 / VS2022 #58540
  • IDE0038 (Use pattern matching) triggered in a context of expression tree lambda #58558
  • [Feature Request] :Run roslyn in the browser so I can compile c# any where. #58532
  • x[^0..^0] should throw #58563
  • IDE0079 should not warn when #Disable Warning IDE0049 is suppressing issue #50892
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Exclude service config files for .Net 6 host from ServiceHub folder #58580
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
  • Update some netcore packages to 6.0.0 #58570
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CodeFixContext cleanup #58565
    Area-IDE
  • Storage options refactoring #58556
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Track nullability information in publicAPI files for C# compiler #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations, Next
  • Add nullability annotation to CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58575
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Update System.Text.Json to 6.0.0 (#58365)" #58572
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58576
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not offer pattern matching inside an Expression-Tree #58559
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58567
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58568
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve error reporting for 'this()' initializer from 'record struct' constructor #58430
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records, Next

Updated

  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58583
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Refactor IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor usage in MethodCompiler #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1533601 #58374
    auto-merge
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • Inline hints options refactoring #58552
    Area-IDE
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1533406 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Break binding cycles caused by type forwarders. #58535
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Simplify new integration tests using a source generator #58524
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extract method options refactoring #58549
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Fix Introduce local formatting #47510
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Experimental API idea for incremental generators #58554
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • can't use @onchange inside RenderFragment, bind works #39288
  • Docker Compose The path must be absolute #39286
  • Warnings when running a .NET 7 Blazor app #39283
    .NET 7.0
  • ANCM + ARM64 Tracking #39281
    .NET 7.0
  • Idea on improving WebAssembly Performance #39277
    Discussions
  • Slow first page load when porting asp.net core from .net 5 to .net 6 #39272
    6.0.x
  • DefaultHealthCheckService never logs exceptions from degraded HealtCheckResults #39271

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpContext)HttpContext). Session #39233
  • Identity Specification Tests Issues #39050
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM, ongoing timers cause a global exception when browser loses focus for some time #39089
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter has incorrect behavior in case of user-added EventHandler #37323
    Backlog
  • HttpContext.Response.Body writes an empty NewLine when no bytes were written #37922
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: updates #39268
  • A better implementation to the definition of IUrlHelper.IsLocalUrl #39119
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Rendering Razor component in server mode in MVC project in partial view - left with empty tag -> related to issues 20332 (unresolved) , 13771 #39214
  • I have searched the existing issues #39278
  • Perf regression: json_netty #39256
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #39262
  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS and OPT_NO_LTS from Installers #38077
    .NET 7 Planning
  • When hosting as Windows Service, Singletons are disposed AFTER the Service has reported to be stopped #39264
  • Blazor wasm PWA runs under LAN and there is no installation icon button #39222
  • Duplicate Razor Component Page value causes Object reference not set to an instance of an object in _Host.cshtml #39228
  • HttpClient functionality difference between VS 2019 and VS 2022 #39232
  • As an HTTP API developer using Open API to enable integration, my APIs include an opinionated convention of ensuring operationId attributes are created for each Web API controller method #27591
    Backlog
  • Due to seasonal holidays, many of our members are taking time off. Please expect delayed responses until early January. #38711
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #39254
  • There is no registered service of type 'System.Net.Http.IHttpClientFactory'. <- Error on Blazor Server #39265

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39287
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Enforce warnings for unused usings #39280
    7.0-preview1
  • Update to SDK v7.0.100-alpha.1.22053.1 #39285
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d81ae2f` to `6b74da4` #39273
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Identity stores tests fixes #39088
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Hard-Code BaselineTest to use 2.1.30 #39279
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.32
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter checks for ErrorContext.Handled flag (#37323) #39275
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Add MIT License Headers to `Components/Web.JS/**/*.ts` Files #39164
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Migrate JSInterop to ESLint #39162
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS/LTS #39141
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39260
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.2
  • Fix typo xml comments #39276
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc
  • Use NullabilityInfoContext in DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider #39219
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39075
    area-blazor
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39259
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39258
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Support DefaultStatusCode annotation on methods #39255
    area-mvc
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] ANCM: Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime
  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, .NET 7.0
  • Fix: InputRadioGroup not registering initial click in some circumstances #39208
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242

    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS] Convert NavigationRenderer to an implementation IViewHandler #3906
    6.0.200-preview.13

Closed

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GroupBy with outer reference not translating properly, causing data loss #27102
  • Stored procedures called multiple times in miliseconds #27101
  • MigrationBuilder.InsertData does not use default schema anymore #27100
  • When trimming, queries fail because of missing System.Math #27097
  • StackOverflowException in nested GroupBy query #27094
  • ChangeTracker: New event for "entity about to get tracked" #27093

Closed

  • TypeMapping bug in translation plugin #27075
  • Circular dependency while creating tables with DatabaseFacade.EnsureCreated on EF Core 6 #26834
    6.0.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
  • [release/6.0] Add [DynamicDependency] on System.Math for trimming #27098

Updated

  • Grinding the gears of war #27055
  • Christmas crackers: Add Property/Reference/etc overloads that take IProperty/INavigation #27058
